altername_name: Zorro: En Busca de la Justicia
name: Zorro: Quest for Justice
overview: Zorro to the Rescue! Villains beware! The masked adventurer Zorro returns in this legendary adventure on Nintendo DS. Vanqish evil-doers with your razor -sharp sword and lightning wit! Features •Unique Fighting System – Use combos to combat Bandits, Pirates and Captain Esteban• 8 Levels – From a Spanish Garrison to the Devil’s Fortress• Multiple Weapons – Use a whip, rapier and other deadly weapons
